wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Percy Bell FRS FRSC FRSE (24 November 1907 – 9 January 1996) was a leading British physical chemist who worked in the Physical Chemistry Laboratory at the University of Oxford.

response: * Ronnie Bell FRS, a physical chemist and Oxford colleague
He was educated at Winchester College and Balliol College, Oxford. He undertook his D.Phil. at Oxford with Ronnie Bell, starting in 1960.
* Ronnie Bell British chemist at Oxford University
